WHY CHOOSE #TESLA?

LEARNING PATHWAY

GET CONSULTATION NOW

  • The only school offering the International Baccalaureate (IB) Integrated Program in Tân Bình District.
  • A modern learning environment with internationally standardized facilities.
  • Students are exposed early to Science, Technology, Design and Languages.
  • Proficiency in English skills.
  • Holistic development of knowledge, skills, mindset, and emotions.
  • Graduates will receive the IB Diploma and/or the National High School Diploma.
  • High competitiveness for admission to prestigious universities worldwide.
  • A professional and experienced team of IB teachers.

WHY CHOOSE

TESLA

SPECIAL PROMOTION

Tuition Savings Up to 2 Billion

15% tuition scholarship for group registration

15% tuition scholarship for Grades 6 - 8

50% discount on registration fee

Tesla Education is the only school in Tân Bình District (Ho Chi Minh City) offering the International Baccalaureate (IB) Integrated Program from Early Years (EYP) to Primary (PYP) and Middle Years (MYP).

TESLA EDUCATION - IB WORLD SCHOOL

By integrating the IB Program with the National Curriculum, Tesla ensures international education standards while preserving Vietnamese culture and language for students on their path to global integration.

REGISTER FOR QUICK CONSULTATION

LEARNING PATHWAY

The International Baccalaureate Middle Years Programme
(IB MYP)
Focus on comprehensive development, interdisciplinary skills, qualified and capable individuals to become a global citizen.
Grade 11 - 12
The International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme
(IB DP)
Receive the International Baccalaureate Diploma
Apply to prestigious International Universities
The International Baccalaureate Primary Years Programme
(IB PYP)
Build a strong knowledge foundation, always be passionate about learning, practice independence and take responsibility.
Preschool - Grade 5
Student-centered, closely combining knowledge and reality, promoting understanding of the world.
Grade 6 - 10
  • A skillful combination of the National Curriculum and the IB framework.
  • Develop students into global citizens who proudly uphold their national identity.
  • Build resilience to overcome challenges and succeed in an ever-changing world.
  • Experiential learning across diverse fields helps students unlock their potential.
  • Inquiry-based learning encourages active thinking, creativity, and collaboration.

ADVANTAGES OF THE IB INTEGRATED PROGRAM

Consult now

HTV Television reported on the announcement of Tesla Education becoming an IB World School.

PARENT TESTIMONIALS

Parents of Ngo The Anh (The Brain Vietnam)
The Integrated IB programme helps him get on very well with his friends. He like working in groups and showing his leadership style. Tesla’s learning environment focused on developing his independence. Learning with foreign teachers will help students be more confident in studying abroad or working in an international environment.
Nguyen Thi Tuyet Loan - Parent
I am very satisfied with my children’s learning outcomes. They not only learned a lot of knowledge in both Vietnamese and English but also had the opportunity to enhance many other skills. After school, they are proactive in exploring deeper about the lessons and excited to discover new knowledge.
Truong Quynh Anh - Parent
After a period of my children studying at Tesla, I see that they are becoming more open. I think the teachers are doing a great job. I hope that the school, students, and parents will maintain a strong connection to create a comfortable learning environment for the children and help them develop according to their age.
Tran Thi Thanh Xuan - Parent
I feel more confident in my choice. I've had the opportunity to hear from the teachers about the program and my child’s real-world activities and experiences. I also feel that my child is more comfortable and happy, which gives me great peace of mind.
Nguyen Thi Hoang Anh - Parent
I am very impressed with the IB program. Not many schools in Vietnam apply this curriculum. At Tesla, the PYP program is quite challenging for the students, as it not only requires a strong knowledge background and agency but also demands proficiency in both English and Vietnamese throughout the learning process.
Parents's sharing about Tesla Education
Interviews with Parents and Early Years-Primary Coordinators in 2023-2024
